availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Asa M. Hall (Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Hall. Father of Mary J. Hall, Luther Hall and Albert Hall. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District No 1, p. 565.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 2, p. 231B.
